Name: Pear-Shaped Spritz
Ingredients: 45 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Wine glass .
POUR all ingredients into chilled glass.
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: A classic white wine and soda spritz, enriched with a splash of pear and cognac liqueur.
History: Created by yours truly in September 2024.
Nutrition: One serving of Pear-Shaped Spritz contains 108 calories
